name: Stylish Aeroplane Dress 'Em Up
description:
CONTROLS:

  • WASD / ARROW KEYS – control ship
  • SHIFT / Z / SPACE – fire weapons
  • LEFT CLICK – select part to place, pick up part, place part
  • RIGHT CLICK – rotate currently selected part (if possible)
  • R – store/scrap currently selected part
  • ESCAPE – pause/menu

This game is a scrolling shoot’em up/dress'em up game with a twist. As your ship is old, barely designed for combat and extremely unstable, your parts will fall off after a while. Thankfully, you can replace them by salvaging new parts from the enemies you destroy!
But how well will you manage to do that in the heat of combat?! 

Be sure to think about how you build yourself up as unbalanced weight will make movement harder. Having guns on every side may make killing enemies a cakewalk, but comes at the sacrifice of extra speed. In this game you constantly have to make decisions and deal with what you’ve been given!

In addition to providing mobility and offensive capabilities, extra parts will also take hits for you. This is important as your core is quite vulnerable. Three hits and you're out!

And some parts ...just look pretty. Dress your plane up for multiplied score!
